panels.description: 'OK'表示所有进程正常，红色数字表示当前未启动的进程数量
panels.title: 主要进程状态

panels.description: 根据磁盘，CPU，内存，数据库进程和数据库连接使用情况算出的健康度数值，范围(0-100)，供参考

targets.expr:
sum(esgyn_db_status_tm)/sum(esgyn_db_status_tm_configure) * (
  avg(1-(node_filesystem_free_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype=~"ext4|xfs"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{mountpoint="/", fstype=~"ext4|xfs"})) * 15 + 
  (1 - avg(1 - (avg by (instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="idle"}[5m]))))) * 20 + 
  (1 - sum(node_memory_MemFree_bytes + node_memory_Buffers_bytes + node_memory_Cached_bytes) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes)) * 25 + 
  sum(esgyn_active_sessions_available)/sum(esgyn_db_status_mxosrvr_configure) * 40 
)

panels.title: 集群健康度(1-100)

panels.description:
每节点大于600region数黄色告警
每节点大于800region数红色告警

targets.target: SELECT total_regions_across_regionservers/(total_regionservers_across_masters*1000)*100 WHERE entityName = "hbase" AND category = SERVICE

panels.title: HBase Regions 使用量

targets.target: SELECT total_regions_across_regionservers WHERE entityName = "hbase" AND category = SERVICE

alert.message: QianBase core文件使用空间告警
alert.name: EsgynDB core file sizes alert

alert.message: EsgynDB日志目录使用空间告警
alert.name: QianBase log file sizes alert

panels.description:
Read bytes 每个磁盘分区每秒读取的比特数
Written bytes 每个磁盘分区每秒写入的比特数
panels.title: 集群磁盘读写数据量
当前打开的文件描述符

targets.target: select dfs_capacity, dfs_capacity_used, dfs_capacity_used_non_hdfs where entityName="hdfs" or entityName="hdfs:nameservice1"
SELECT jvm_heap_used_mb_across_regionservers WHERE entityName = "hbase" AND category = SERVICE
SELECT  total_bytes_read_rate_across_datanodes, total_bytes_written_rate_across_datanodes WHERE entityName = "hdfs" AND category = SERVICE
SELECT total_regions_across_regionservers WHERE entityName = "hbase" AND category = SERVICE
